name: Karma Online: Prisoners of the Dead
name_original: Karma Online: Prisoners of the Dead
description:
Karma Online: Prisoners of the Dead is an action-shooter game developed by Dragonfly. It was originally released in 2011. Joymax published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Karma Online: Prisoners of the Dead on PC.
